page_description: Fortek 2-Way Dampers provide simple and cost-effective control and isolation management. Various sealing systems, including special alloy springs and an air fan, can be used to ensure the correct sealing efficiency required for your application.
gen_li_5: Standard range from DN250 to DN4500 (other sizes available upon request)
tech_pressure_description: 50kPa (0.5 bar) as standard but can also design for higher values on request.
tech_heat_description: 600°C (m/s 2.2) as standard, but we can design up to 1250°C (m/s2.2) F on request.
banner_description: Fortek 2-Way Dampers provide simple and cost-effective control and isolation management. Various sealing systems, including special alloy springs and an air fan, can be used to ensure the correct sealing efficiency required for your application.
